name: Cele, Etherym of the Gate
text:
2 Sea Serpent monsters
You take no damage from battles involving this monster and monsters this card points to. This card cannot be targeted for an attack if it is point to an "Etherym" monster. You can only use the following effects of "Cele, Etherym of the Gate" once per turn. If an "Etherym" monster is sent to the GY: You can add 1 "Etherym" Spell/Trap that is banished or in the GY to your hand. If an "Etherym" monster is banished: You can return 1 card your opponent controls to their hand.
